TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateContainerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateContainerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TemplateContainerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 声明属性的容器控件的基类型，该属性返回 接口并用 特性进行标记。

span.span: Declares the base type of the container control of a property that returns an interface and is marked with the attribute.

summary.span: 具有 属性的控件必须实现 接口。

span.span: The control with the property must implement the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析器将作为对象的参数传入的对象用作在数据绑定表达式中使用的对象的类型。The object that is passed in as a parameter of the object is used by the parser as the type of object that is used in data-binding expressions. 其属性返回接口并标记为的控件必须实现接口。The control whose property returns an interface and is marked with the , must implement the interface. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建名为`TemplatedFirstControl`的模板化控件，并将其与名为`FirstTemplateContainer`的容器相关联。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 这允许创建自定义控件，这些控件在未指定模板时显示服务器时间，在指定模板时显示模板内容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.vb#1)] 以下 Web 窗体演示如何使用在前面的代码示例中创建的自定义控件。The following Web form demonstrates how to use the custom control created in the preceding code example. 在页面上放置`TemplatedFirstControl`了的两个实例：Two instances of the `TemplatedFirstControl` are placed on the page: - 第一个实例包含模板``。The first instance includes the template ``. - 第二个实例不包含``; 因此，它只显示时间。The second instance does not include ``; therefore, it shows just the time. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的容器类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified container type.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建名为`TemplatedFirstControl`的模板化控件，并将其与名为`FirstTemplateContainer`的容器相关联。The following code example shows how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 这允许创建自定义控件，这些控件在未指定模板时显示服务器时间，在指定模板时显示模板内容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. 类可 `FirstTemplate` 用于属性。The class is used for the `FirstTemplate` property. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取容器控件的绑定方向。

span.span: Gets the binding direction of the container control.

value.span: 一个 ，指示容器控件的绑定方向。

span.span: A indicating the container control's binding direction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以是字段，模板只能接受属性值或字段，模板可以接受和公开属性值。 The property can be either the field, where the template can accept only property values or the field, where the template can accept and expose property values. 在后一种方案中，数据绑定控件可以使用`Bind`数据绑定语法自动使用数据源的更新、删除和插入操作。In the latter scenario, data-bound controls automatically can use the update, delete, and insert operations of a data source using the `Bind` data-binding syntax. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)和[数据绑定表达式概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建名为`TemplatedFirstControl`的模板化控件，并将其与名为`FirstTemplateContainer`的容器相关联。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 这允许创建自定义控件，这些控件在未指定模板时显示服务器时间，在指定模板时显示模板内容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the contents of the template when the template is specified. `FirstTemplate`方法确定的 `TemplateFirstControl` 属性的属性。 The method determines the property of the `FirstTemplate` property of the `TemplateFirstControl`. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建名为`TemplatedFirstControl`的模板化控件，并将其与名为`FirstTemplateContainer`的容器相关联。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 这允许创建自定义控件，这些控件在未指定模板时显示服务器时间，在指定模板时显示模板内容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. 类用于`FirstTemplate` 属性， `FirstTemplateContainer` 并用于将属性指定为。 The class is used for the `FirstTemplate` property and for specifying the property as `FirstTemplateContainer`.
